message.raw:
Add preserveFixedJoint option to the URDF parser

The preserveFixedJoint option is meant to disable the lumping
of fixed joints by mantaining the type of a fixed joint,
instead of converting it to a revolute joint with max and min positions limits
set to 0 .

See #!/osrf/sdformat/issues/131/disabling-lumping-on-a-fixed-joint-in-a
